questions.question: When do you think the metaverse will provide those experiences for a large number, like a majority of the population?
What are the different steps you could take to protect people's data on the security front?
So I think this isn't like a question of, can you get rid of all bullying?
Is like, how do you define what the harm is and how acute that is?
And this is one of the big questions around AI is like how generalizable can things be?
And then the last thing is I ask them every day, what did you do today to help someone?
What kind of world would you like to see your daughters grow up in even after you're gone?
